summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ACE (Academic Clarity Engine) - Penn State academic advisor app. Fixed critical frontend bug (undefined studentId) and verified all core authentication, onboarding, and AI chat features are working correctly.

flaky_endpoints.workaround: Login works with existing users, suggests database/server issue with new user creation

passed_tests: Backend API /api/ root endpoint returns success
Backend API /api/policies returns 12 Penn State policies with correct structure
Backend API /api/user/profile-options returns campus, academic levels, credit loads, financial aid options
Backend API /api/auth/login works with email/password authentication
Backend API /api/auth/me returns current user information
Backend API /api/user/profile saves onboarding profile data
Backend API /api/student/intelligence returns personalized insights based on profile
Backend API /api/chats returns user chat sessions
Backend API /api/chat/send works with AI integration (GPT-5.2) and returns structured responses
Backend API /api/auth/logout successfully logs out user
Login page loads with email/password form and Google OAuth button
Signup page loads with complete registration form
Navigation between login and signup pages works correctly
Onboarding flow works with 3-step process (campus/major, academic standing, additional info)
Profile completion redirects to main assistant
Main assistant interface loads correctly after fixing studentId bug
Chat functionality works - messages can be sent and AI responses are received
AI responses include clarifying questions and structured format
Chat history appears in left sidebar
Admin access control works (non-admin users redirected appropriately)
Session management and authentication flow works correctly
User profile context is passed to AI conversations
Policy vault integration works with risk classification
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix signup endpoint (/api/auth/signup) returning 520 error - investigate server/database configuration for new user creation
